PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-07722020-10-02,  TC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Port Authorities Operations Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the PORT AUTHORITIES OPERATIONS REGULATIONS in order to reflect the amalgamated Hamilton-Oshawa Port Authority in the Regulations to outline the permitted and prohibited activities, as well as the port's authorization powers.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0220 Publication Date: 2020-10-28
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Port Authorities Operations Regulations
precis: Regulations amending the PORT AUTHORITIES OPERATIONS REGULATIONS in order to reflect the amalgamated Hamilton-Oshawa Port Authority in the Regulations to outline the permitted and prohibited activities, as well as the port's authorization powers.
